price: (Yewe Muhamadi), ntukanyeganyeze ururimi rwawe kubera ubwira ngo (Qur’an) itagucika (ugira ngo uvuge ibyo uhishurirwa, ahubwo ujye utega amatwi wumve ibyo uba uhishurirwa na Malayika Jibrilu).
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
